EWL
The Enlightened Widget Library (EWL) is a widget toolkit that builds upon the foundations constructed by the other libs in the EFL. Ewl uses Evas as its rendering backend and its appearence is abstracted out for Edje to handle.
EWL is similar in feel to many of the other toolkits out there including GTK, QT or MOTIF. The APIs differ but the concepts are the same.
